Trade/Device Name(s): IMPACT Dx Factor V Leiden and Factor II Genotyping Test
Regulation Name(s): Factor V Leiden DNA Mutation Detection Systems
Specimen Type(s): Genomic DNA isolated from EDTA anti-coagulated human whole blood samples
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Matrix-assisted laser desorption/ionization time-of-flight mass spectrometry (MALDI-TOF MS)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Sequenom IMPACT Dx Factor V Leiden and Factor II Genotyping Test using MALDI-TOF mass spectrometry for detection of hereditary thrombophilia mutations.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative in vitro diagnostic genotyping test for detection and genotyping of Factor V Leiden (G1691A) and Factor II (G20210A) mutations from EDTA anti-coagulated human whole blood as an aid in diagnosis of patients with suspected thrombophilia.
